page.title: 08CHURCHES
page.content:
7) Saint Nicholas. This church has recently been demolished and has been converted into old people's flats with a community hall. 8) Holy Trinity. Bournes Green and Southchurch parish.
METHODIST CHURCHES. There is a circuit of 11 churches in Southend 3 of which appear in the grid. 1) Whittingham Road 2) Ferndale Road 3) Branksome Road. Present minister serves York Road church. Seats 100. Congregation of 30.
Other churches in the grid are: The Baptist Tabernacle The Independent Church of New Jerusalem The United Reform Church.
